CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Direct-to-Consumer relative to Flash Sale Platforms?
SRP.A: Direct-to-Consumer is {below} Flash Sale Platforms in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total return rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Clothing Merchants}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total return rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Flash Sale Platforms}.

VE.Q: What is Clothing Merchants's Return Rate in 1995?
VE.A: Clothing Merchants's return rate in 1995 is {41.11} %.

VE.Q: What is Beauty Products's Return Rate in 1983?
VE.A: Beauty Products's return rate in 1983 is {12.03} %.

VE.Q: What is Clothing Merchants's Return Rate in 1982?
VE.A: Clothing Merchants's return rate in 1982 is {12.48} %.

VE.Q: What are the return rate of Clothing Merchants, Furniture Sellers, and Seasonal Goods in 1995?
VE.A: Clothing Merchants's return rate is {41.11} %, Furniture Sellers's return rate is {9.07} %, Seasonal Goods's return rate is {0.10} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Return Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum return rate is {0.10} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Return Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum return rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Return Rate level recorded for Beauty Products?
What is the lowest Return Rate level recorded for Beauty Products?
EVJ.A: Beauty Products's lowest recorded level is approximately {9.17} % in {1980}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Return Rate?
SC.A: The average total return rate is {98.27} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Return Rate fall between 87.56 and 96.78 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Return Rate go below 74.79 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Return Rate exceed 109.55 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 2008, did the total Return Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total return rate between 1984 and 2008 was {larger} than between 1992 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 2006, did the total Return Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total return rate between 1982 and 2006 was {larger} than between 1995 and 2006.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2001, did the total Return Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total return rate between 1999 and 2001 was {smaller} than between 1983 and 2000.

NC.Q: Was the total Return Rate in 1996 higher or lower than in 2006?
NC.A: The total return rate in 1996 was {lower} than in 2006.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Clothing Merchants} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Flash Sale Platforms, Electronics Retailers, Seasonal Goods, Direct-to-Consumer, Furniture Sellers, Beauty Products, Clothing Merchants}.
